item.title: CVE-2022-2958|2024-08-03T00:52:59.878Z -- unknown -- badgeos
item.description: The BadgeOS WordPress plugin before 3.7.1.3 does not sanitise and escape parameters before using them in SQL statements via AJAX actions available to any authenticated users, leading to SQL Injections
